name: Slash Racer
description: Go fast in this driving game by Thrashplay. In "Slash Racer", you control a vehicle moving at high speeds along a vertical track. Slowing down isn't an option, so you have to veer left or right to collect stars for points. But avoid any obstacles, or you're toast. Like many arcade games, the goal of Slash Racer is to achieve the highest score possible without crashing. Download and get driving today!
